<S%H7971>Send<s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>cunning<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and in <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and in <S%H710>purple,<s%> and <S%H3758>crimson,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and that can <S%H3045>skill<s%> to <S%H6603>grave<s%> with the <S%H2450>cunning<s%> men that are with me in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H25>father<s%> did <S%H3559>provide.<s%>

<S%H2361>Huram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>endued<s%> with <S%H7922>prudence<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> that might <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and an <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore the <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> has <S%H559>spoken<s%> of, let him <S%H7971>send<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants:<s%>
